physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Chronic weakness, inability to walk independently, severe chronic pain in head, arms, shoulders, and legs.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially, total body pain that was debilitating (requiring inpatient hospitalization). Now pain mostly limited to shoulders and knees, controlled with medications, occasional corticosteroid injections, physical therapy, and acupuncture. Mental health has improved; no longer has nightmares and anxiety is lessened.
